meanings.definition: A person or thing that diversifies.
meanings.sent1: The company hired new diversifiers to bring fresh ideas to the team.
meanings.sent2: The diversifiers in the market helped create a more varied selection of products.
meanings.sent3: The diversifiers at the party made sure everyone had a different game to play.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like a box of colorful diversifiers, each one adding a unique touch.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with diversifiers, from flowers of all shapes and colors to unique sculptures.

meanings.sent1: The diversifiers in the room all had different backgrounds and experiences.
meanings.sent2: She collected various diversifiers, from stamps to coins, to add to her collection.
meanings.sent3: The diversifiers on the shelf seemed to have a secret meeting when she wasn't looking.
meanings.sent4: The diversifiers in the orchestra blended together to create a harmonious melody.
meanings.sent5: The artist's palette was a mix of diversifiers, ready to be combined into a masterpiece.
